title: Test Event concept (ELIXIR-EXCELERATE WP2 Benchmarking schemas)

_id.title: The unique id of the test event.

_schema.title: The JSON schema absolute URI. It must match the value of 'id' in the JSON schema

tool_id.title: The tool id which takes the input and reference datasets declared in the benchmarking event

received_datasets.title: The output, report and metrics datasets received for this testEvent

dataset_id.title: A received dataset, with this id

role.title: The kind of dataset received for this event (report, output, metrics)

received.title: Reception date of the dataset (redundant, as the output dataset already has this date)

benchmarking_event_id.title: The id of the benchmarking event where this test event was generated

test_contact_ids.title: The testEvent contact id(s), i.e. the runners of the tool and depositors of the results

dates.title: Relevant dates for this test event

creation.title: Creation date of the test event

modification.title: Last modification date of the test event

public.title: The date when this test event becomes public

metadata.title: Relevant metadata used to call the tool
